### 3

  0100 1100 0110 1001

+0110 1110 0110 1011

=1011 1010 1101 0100

+0010 0000 0100 1100

=1101 1011 0010 0000

+0110 0001 0111 1001

=0011 1100 1001 1010

+0110 0101 0111 0010

=1010 0010 0000 1100

thus, the complement is

0101 1101 1111 0011



### 5

R = 0100



### 6

a. R = 0000

b. R = 1111

c. R = 1001



### 17

K * 512 bit = 51200 bit

10Mbps, t<sub>wait</sub> = 5.12ms
